page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: {LANDSCAPE}-Uniform plateau with entrenched valleys. {GEOLOGY} -Limestone and shale. {LAND USE }-Mixed farming,mainly pastoral. {HABITATIONS}-Caerwys(small town) Babell(small village). {LANDMARKS}-Part of Offa's Dyke, Tumulii, Town Square, St Michael's Church, Bell House, Town Hall, Old Court, Ysgol Yr Esgob(New School) Playing Fields, Caravan Park. {ANNUAL EVENTS}-Agricultural Show and Sports,Carnival, Cambrian Horse Show,Clay Pigeon Shoot, Sheepdog Trials, Pancake Race. {CLUBS,SOCIETIES AND ASSOCIATIONS}- Brownies, Guides, Scouts, Youth Club, Cubs, Women's Institute, Mother's Union,Derby and Joan,Civic Society,Football, Bowling, Keepfit, Play School,Morris Dancing.
